title: Video: SOAK – Blud
body:
Having started the year off by becoming the first signing to Goodbye Records, a label run by 2013 success story CHVRCHES, Irish teenager **Soak** has released the visuals to go with her stunning debut single, _Blud_.

As with the track itself, it’s harrowingly beautiful in its simplicity and effortlessly cool nature, embodying the very ethos of youthfulness yet coming across as bold and strikingly uplifting.
